Feature.Name: Bead of Nourishment
Feature.Text: This spongy, flavorless, gelatinous bead dissolves on your tongue and provides as much nourishment as 1 day of rations.

MagicProperty.Name: Bead of Nourishment
MagicProperty.Description: This spongy, flavorless, gelatinous bead dissolves on your tongue and provides as much nourishment as 1 day of rations.
